CorruptTheSpire:FragmentOfCorruption.NAME: Fragment of Corruption
DESCRIPTIONS: Small fragment of corrupted Spirestone. Can be used at corrupted Rest Sites.

CorruptTheSpire:BlightedSpirefruit.NAME: Blighted Spirefruit
CorruptTheSpire:BlightedSpirefruit.FLAVOR: Infected with the Spireblight, but maybe eat it anyway?
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce your Max HP by #b{0}. At the start of combat, gain {1} #yStrength.

CorruptTheSpire:BagOfTricks.NAME: Bag of Tricks
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b{0} #yAfterimage. Draw #b{1} less cards on the first turn of each combat.

CorruptTheSpire:UnreliableCharm.NAME: Unreliable Charm
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, if the floor number is even, gain #b{0} #yStrength, #b{1} #yPlated #yArmor, and #b{2} #yThorns. If the floor number is odd, lose #b{0} #yStrength.

CorruptTheSpire:RustedOrichalcum.NAME: Rusted Orichalcum
CorruptTheSpire:RustedOrichalcum.FLAVOR: But this metal is supposed to be indestructible....
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your first #b{0} turns, gain #b{1} Block. At the start of combat, gain #b{2} #yConstricted.

CorruptTheSpire:ObsidianShovel.NAME: Obsidian Shovel
CorruptTheSpire:ObsidianShovel.FLAVOR: Made of a special material that absorbs and neutralizes corruption.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can now bury Fragments of Corruption at corrupted Rest Sites.

CorruptTheSpire:CorruptedEgg.NAME: Corrupted Egg
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards in rewards have #b+{0}% chance to be upgraded. Gain #b{1} #yCorruption every time you gain an #yupgraded card.
